record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - September 07, 2007)

[Page: H10308]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on September 7, 2007, I missed 3 recorded votes.
I take my voting responsibility very seriously. Had I been present, I would have voted "no" on recorded vote number 862, "no" on recorded vote 863 and "yea" on recorded vote 864.
